London Steps

This project was purely an attempt to work with Apple Health data. Particularly, learning how to export it, clean it, and make it useful. I really wanted to work with this health data in order to create a personal dashboard to better track my health. While Apple Health definitely serves as a great backbone for step data, it does lack the ability to notice certain trends. I decided to take the data from a trip to London to see what my average step count looked like. It can be viewed here.

  • Role: Developer
  • Client: Personal
  • Tools: Apple Health Data, d3.js, HTML/CSS
  • Year: 2015
Simple graph created using d3.js
When hovering over, it highlights step count
